channel.title: 🏢 Sony AI on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Sony AI on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: GenWarp: Single Image to Novel Views with Semantic-Preserving Generative Warping
item.description: GenWarp generates high-quality novel image views from a single input image by using a semantic-preserving generative warping framework, outperforming existing methods.
